author: eggdragon
description: This is Generative NFT creation tool
name: jumble-machine

scripts.start: concurrently -k "cross-env BROWSER=none npm run react-start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && tsc -p electron -w" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && tsc -p electron && electron ."
scripts.dist:win: npm run build:python && npm run build && tsc -p electron && electron-builder --win --x64 -c.extraMetadata.main=build/electron.js
scripts.dist:mac: npm run build:python && npm run build && tsc -p electron && electron-builder --mac --x64 -c.extraMetadata.main=build/electron.js
scripts.dist:mac-m1: npm run build:python && npm run build && tsc -p electron && electron-builder --mac --arm64 -c.extraMetadata.main=build/electron.js
scripts.dist:linux: npm run build:python && npm run build && tsc -p electron && electron-builder -l -c.extraMetadata.main=build/electron.js
scripts.dist:win-publish: npm run build:python && npm run build && tsc -p electron && electron-builder --win --x64 --publish always -c.extraMetadata.main=build/electron.js
scripts.dist:win-never: npm run build:python && npm run build && tsc -p electron && electron-builder --win --x64 --publish never -c.extraMetadata.main=build/electron.js
scripts.dist:win-githubAction: npm run build:python && npm run build && tsc -p electron
